name: Carnivorous Bananas
description:
Carnivorous Bananas!

Made for Ludum Dare 46 - Keep it alive in 72 hours. All art and programming was done myself while music was sourced from Bensounds.com.

Some additions were added post-jam but the windows downloadable version is the original in case that matters to you.

Please enjoy and feel free to rate it on the LD site linked above.

Thanks!
